author: Special Correspondent
text:
The death toll in the fire accident on the Tamil Nadu Newsprint and Papers Limited (TNPL) premises in the district has risen to three. Police sources said K. Devaraj (50), a contract labourer who sustained severe injuries, died in a private hospital in Coimbatore in the late hours on Thursday.

The victim hails from Muthanur in Karur district. The post-mortem was carried out and the body was handed over to the victim’s family.
title: TNPL fire accident toll rises to three
